name: issue-crawler
description: Crawls GitHub issues and index them into an Elasticsearch instance

scripts.test: ES_HOST=http://localhost:9200 ES_USER=elastic ES_PASSWORD=changeme GITHUB_OAUTH_APP_ID=1 GITHUB_OAUTH_PRIVATE_KEY='FAKE_KEY' GITHUB_OAUTH_INSTALLATION_ID=123 jest
